price: 8. Woo marih orbeyná akeeral girá usun addunyal abak sugen umaaneh galtóh.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: ulāika mawāhumu al-nāru bimā kānū yaksibūna
